sentence: We had early dinner reservations and the clerk thought we could get into our room by 4 pm if she requested a rush
The pool bar had some good touches like large bottles of milk etc to take back to the room
To get from my wing of the hotel room 503 to the entry of DCA restaurants was long or through the pool
Parking attendant and the people in charge of luggage are not very helpful and the restaurant Napa Rose is ridiculously overpriced and the food is nothing special
The moved the snacks and noon and later food outdoors which is okay unles it is too hot cold or raining
Still feel restaurant prices are hugely overpriced but I guess you have to pay for the experience
Surprised to see plates of food not taken away sooner
If they could find a way to better accommodate those waiting for a table this restaurant would be so much more enjoyable as the food was really quite good
The menu does not have a great selection and it is pricey but the portions were large
Other than eating breakfast in White Water Snacks and having a few drinks in the lounge we did not use any of the other amenities
We ate at the Story Tellers Cafe
The hotel staff kept the room spotless and there were plenty of dining choices here for our needs
Great restaurants and bars
We had Dinner at Storytellers Cafe
We had character breakfast at Storytellers
Breakfast with Disney characters at the storyteller cafe was a great experience for the kids

What a treat to stay at the Grand After a long day at the park a short walk to your room is a blessing on the feet The grand offers high end eateries and spa service that is well worth the trip very clean and depending on hour room it may include a beautiful scenery right out the sliding door
The food is very good in all the restaurants but space is limited
The arts and crafts architecture is breathtaking the location near the parks and downtown Disney is divine I watched the Disneyland fireworks from me balcony and the dining option are fabulous
Lots of good dining options here
